basics.name: Sakura Takahashi
basics.label: Undergraduate Mathematics and Computer Science Student at UH Manoa
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Mathematics and Computer Science in the Department of Mathematics and Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Project Management Intern for HDOT Airports Division
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official PDRs and field orders
Designed signage for concourse E at HNL Airport

work.summary: Economics Research Assistant under the Housing Division
highlights: Created pro forma models based on Oahu housing data
Coded housing dashboards in R for the state government

volunteer.organization: Hawaii Center for Research and Excellence in Applied Mathematics
volunteer.summary: Undergraduate Research Assistant under Alan Tong
highlights: Designed a mathematical model for optiming TheBus routes
Created data visualizations for various projects

awards.title: Urban Planning State Champion
awards.summary: Won the annual ULI state competition after winning the chapter division
